nodes.text: While searching for allies to aid them in repelling an upcoming Imperial attack on Xorrn, a group of Rebel Alliance agents arrived on the planet Kowak, a notorious slaver hideout operated by the Zygerrian Prince Sono Molec.

During this time, Molec lost his gladiator champion, the Mandalorian Nam Beroya—known as the "Prince's Sword"—to trade baron Dorn Sevelle of the Karazak Slavers Cooperative after losing a gambling bet. Molec promised to provide the Rebels with soldiers if they retrieved the Prince's Sword. To this end, the agents raided slaving camps on Kowak in an attempt to rescue Nam Beroya.
